mapper.select: SELECT SYS_COD, SORT_DEPT, GUBUN, DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM, DEPT_TITLE, TOT_INWON, CHUL_INWON, JIGAK_INWON, SAGO_INWON, SAGO_01, SAGO_02, SAGO_03, SAGO_04, SAGO_05, SAGO_06, SAGO_07, SAGO_08, SAGO_09, SAGO_10, T_TOT_INWON, T_CHUL_INWON, T_JIGAK_INWON, T_SAGO_INWON, T_SAGO_01, T_SAGO_02, T_SAGO_03, T_SAGO_04, T_SAGO_05, T_SAGO_06, T_SAGO_07, T_SAGO_08, T_SAGO_09, T_SAGO_10, '20170102' DATA, CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), GETDATE(),102) YYYYMMDD FROM DBO.SF_KUNTAE_TODAY_PJT(#{DATE},'',#{DEPT_CD}) ORDER BY SORT_DEPT, GUBUN

SELECT TOP 300 A.WORK_DT, SUBSTRING(DBO.YO_IL4(A.WORK_DT),1,1) DATE_PART, SUBSTRING(DBO.YO_IL4(A.WORK_DT),2,7) COLOR, (SUBSTRING(A.START_TIME,1,2)+':'+ SUBSTRING(A.START_TIME,3,2)) START_TIME, A.END_DT, (SUBSTRING(A.END_TIME,1,2)+':'+ SUBSTRING(A.END_TIME,3,2)) END_TIME, ROUND(A.DAY_TIME,0,1) + CASE WHEN RIGHT(A.DAY_TIME, 2) >= 30 THEN .50 ELSE .00 END M_DAY_TIME, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(WORK_TIME) FROM T_PM1020 WHERE WORK_DT = A.WORK_DT AND EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO),0) WORK_TIME, CASE C.HOLID_GB WHEN '1' THEN (CASE WHEN A.START_TIME = '' OR A.START_TIME IS NULL THEN '' ELSE (CASE B.HOLI_WORK WHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE '휴일근무' END) END) ELSE (CASE WHEN A.START_TIME = '' OR A.START_TIME IS NULL THEN (CASE A.SAYOU_CD WHEN '' THEN '결근' WHEN ' ' THEN '결근' ELSE (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '350' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.SAYOU_CD)END)ELSE (CASE B.LATE_YN WHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE '지각' END) END) END BIGO, ISNULL((SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE LEVEL1_CD='120' AND BUSI_GB='J' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.SAYOU_CD),'') SAYOU_NM, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE LEVEL1_CD='110' AND BUSI_GB='J' AND LEVEL2_CD = D.WORK_STEP) WORK_NM, A.DEPT_CD, A.EMP_NO, D.WORK_STEP, D.ETC_SPEC, E.KOR_NM, A.ETC_TIME, D.PJT_CD FROM T_PM1010 A, T_PM1028 B, T_SC9200 C, T_PM1020 D, T_HM1000 E WHERE A.WORK_DT = B.WORK_DT AND A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO AND D.EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO AND D.WORK_DT = A.WORK_DT AND A.WORK_DT = C.DAY_YM+C.DAY_DD AND A.WORK_DT = #{DATE} AND A.DEPT_CD = #{DEPT_CD} AND E.EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO ORDER BY C.DAY_YM DESC ,DAY_DD ASC
